alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Macon; Smith; Sumner; Trousdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:00PM CDT until July 01 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Smith County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Jackson County in Middle Tennessee... Northeastern Sumner County in Middle Tennessee... Macon County in Middle Tennessee... Trousdale County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 200 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Westmoreland, or 10 miles northwest of Hartsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Lafayette, Hartsville, Westmoreland, Red Boiling Springs, Portland, Bethpage, Dixon Springs, Pleasant Shade, Oak Grove, Bledsoe Creek State Park and Bugtussle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm may occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
